content.raw:
thanks @jshep1

we should use this branch to test [ign-gui pull request 215](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/215/gui0-use-rendering2/diff) by updating the ign-gui0.yaml file in the [gui0_rendering2 branch of gazebodistro](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebodistro/branch/gui0_rendering2#diff) and re-running the ign-gui windows job:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_gui-pr-win&build=101)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_gui-pr-win/101/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_gui-pr-win/101/
